A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The past two Disney Star Wars movies are a huge disappointment. Disney had a golden opportunity to create new stories and add to the Star Wars mythos. Instead\, they played it safe and stuck to a formula that they know would maximize profits. This movie\, and its predecessor is basically Avengers with a Star Wars skin. This movie has gratuitous action scenes with no purpose to advance the story. It has meaningless subplots and minor characters that go nowhere for no reason. **SPOILER** : Poe Dameron should be court marshalled and sentenced to life in prison. His insubordination led to the deaths of hundreds of people--also for no good reason; And this guy is treated like an iconic hero? Disney is killing Star Wars.
